ยืมหนังสือ
ผ่าโจทย์ 1000 ข้อสอบ

An exam is a formal test that you take to show your knowledge or ability in a particular subject, or to obtain a qualification. If you have a medical exam, a doctor looks at your body, feels it, or does simple tests in order to check how healthy you are.
